verses.roman:
ethā rūpa-gosāñi yabe mathurā āilā
dhruva-ghāṭe tāṅre subuddhi-rāya mililā

synonyms: ethā—there; rūpa-gosāñi—Rūpa Gosāñi; yabe—when; mathurā āilā—came to Mathurā; dhruva-ghāṭe—at the bank of the Yamunā known as Dhruva-ghāṭa; tāṅre—him; subuddhi-rāya—a devotee of Lord Caitanya named Subuddhi Rāya; mililā—met.
translation: When Rūpa Gosvāmī reached Mathurā, he met Subuddhi Rāya on the banks of the Yamunā at a place called Dhruva-ghāṭa.
